short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Move browser windows to secondary screen

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A developers tool to move popup windows into a secondary screen and let them go fullscreen. Moves popup windows only which have a 
<meta name="secondaryscreen" content="true" /> tag. 

Version 1.0.4 fixes an issue with handling of "Scan again" after the OS setup for primary/secondary monitor is changed
